en-US.summary: Listen to Podcast Player, less la la la, more bla bla bla.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Podcast Player to play
en-US.name: Podcast Player
en-US.description:
Listen to Podcast Player, with less la la la, and more bla bla bla.

Podcast Player provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best podcasts.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Podcast Player" or "Alexa, play podcast player" to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
